SELECT WARE_DTL_DV_CD /* 창고상세구분 */ , WARE_NO /* 창고번호 */ , WARE_NM /* 창고명 */ FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ /* 월별창고내역 */ WHERE DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND WARE_USE_YN = 'Y' AND APY_YM = SUBSTR(#{baseDt}, 1, 6)
AND WARE_DTL_DV_CD = '20'
AND WARE_DTL_DV_CD = '30'
ORDER BY WARE_DTL_DV_CD, TO_NUMBER(SORT_DV_VAL), WARE_NM, WARE_NO
